vulnerability.name: USN-3953-2
vulnerability.description: USN-3953-1 fixed several vulnerabilities in PHP. This update provides the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM and Ubuntu 14.04 ESM.  Original advisory details:   It was discovered that PHP incorrectly handled certain exif tags in JPEG  images. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause PHP to crash,  resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.

statements.status_notes: Several security issues were fixed in PHP. Available with Ubuntu Pro.
